name: Frawg
description:
Frist ""big"" project I am working on as a game dev. This game is about playing as a frog and shooting out your tongue to stick to surfaces. It is currently just a prototype, if you are interested go check my Dev Logs on this game or email me at omeletton@gmail.com. 

Also if you are an artist if a bit of time, and you would like to make some art for this game (no profit), then email me. I am not an artist so the game looks accordingly :)
